message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $100. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of a price around $105. Would you be willing to consider that?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $120, so I'm thinking $112.50. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $108?
I'm glad you like the product, Bob! I can see you're really close to making a decision. I'm willing to shave off a few more dollars, so I'm thinking $115. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do a bit better. Would you be willing to consider $112?
I think we're really close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $113. Can we shake on it?
I'm really close, but I think I can do a bit better. Would you be willing to consider $111?
